text:
I tried to connect through  telnet to my jakarta tomcat server, and when I do a
Get / http/1.1, I got this message:

HTTP/1.1 505 HTTP Version Not Supported
Server: Apache-Coyote/1.1
Date: Mon, 25 Jul 2005 15:59:34 GMT
Connection: close

Why is that??
creator: dark_ning@yahoo.com.mx

text:
See http://www.faqs.org/rfcs/rfc2616.html

Use HTTP/1.1

See the tomcat-user list for more information.
creator: funkman@joedog.org
